locality: Road from São Jose do Barreiro (SP-221) to the entrance of Parque Nacional Serra da Bocaina between Km 24 and Km 27.

occurrenceRemarks: Arbusto 50 cm. Frutos vinosos com cálice avermelhado. Barranco em Campo de altitude..

recordedBy: Marcelo Reginato|J. B. Pereira|Paulo H. Labiak
Almeda, F.; Martins, A. B.; Fritsch, P. W.; Aranha Filho, J. L.M.; Bush, C.; Belinello, R.
locality: Municipio São Jose do Barreiro. Road from São Jose do Barreiro (SP-221) to the entrance of Parque Nacional Serra da Bocaina between Km 24 and Km 27.
occurrenceRemarks: Shrub to 0.7 m tall with glossy leaves. Inflorescences pendent. Flowers completely white. Immature berries green flushed with red. Uncommon.
